entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Global Exception Handling Mechanism for .NET MAUI #5535
  • Maui crashes when launching a new window in a new thread #5534
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #5531
  • Can't build for iOS simulators in p14, codesign exited with code 1 #5530
  • CarouselPage Migration #5526
  • OnIdiom don't work correct on Shell - FlyoutBehavior #5524
  • Html from Local File in Windows #5523
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync not working on iOS #5517
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView's AllowSingleSignOnUsingOSPrimaryAccount defaults to false #5512
  • How to set app launch window size #5509
  • Shell.GotoAsync not working #5506
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • First time Picker selection (except 1st item) not working in iOS #5505
    6.0.300
  • Toolbar with Tabbed Pages in shell #5504

Closed

  • [Bug] Not rendering Shadows off-screen controls in ScrollView #2881
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Desktop tenets: Security #2540
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Blazor Desktop test infrastructure and plans #2543
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows]Flow direction RTL not working in HorizontalStackLayout #4748
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • RTL flow direction not working properly in stack layout #3779
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Windows] Wrong CarouselPage behavior scrolling items #4087
    6.0.300
  • [Android] CarouselPage not working correctly #4086
    6.0.300
  • Picker , DatePicker and TimePicker popup did not open in MacCatalyst #3748
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Auto Suggest Box - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5144
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Project with SkiaSharp nugets is not built for iOS (error MSB6006: "ditto" exited with code 1) #5329
    6.0.300
  • Application.Current.RequestedTheme fails on WinUI with an AV #5179
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Label MaxLines doesn't work #4805
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Button release outside button area. #5457
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Review accessibility properties used in default template #5487
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] [Android] Calling Unfocus on Entry has no effect #3380
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Entry does not lose focus and keyboard does not hide #4781
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Bug] Workload ID maui is not recognized - Unable to find even a single workload #3099
  • Incorrect Frame behavior on WinUI such as shadow, margin, content position, corner radius, etc. #4804
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] VS 2022 automatic selecting wrong jdk-11 #2884
  • "Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Text.dll'" debugging MAUI app on Windows Machine #3167
  • .NET MAUI preview 9: Info.plist changes ignored #3240
  • [Bug] On iOS: SetUseSafeArea(true) isn't setting a safe area at the top of the screen, and doubles the safe area at the bottom of the screen #2658
  • [Bug] iOS build and deploy to mac seems slow #2997
  • Main MAUI project is not selected for deploy by default #2655
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] MSBuild-Error for IOS Release Build on Windows (connected to Mac) #3321
  • Maui blazor show "no content(404)" error when NavigateTo with force load #2546
  • Android: SQLConnection.open Android: A connection was successfully established with the server, but then an error occurred during the pre-login handshake. (provider: TCP Provider, error: 35 - An internal exception was caught) #3522
  • VS 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 is using the complete absolute Path for BundleResources for SmartCopy Task for iOS #3551
  • View Transformations Not Applied on iOS #3600
  • .NET Maui application throws System.DllNotFoundException for Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll #3626
  • VerticalStackLayout doesn't pass proper constraints to its children #3654
  • Implement MenuItem API for MacCatalyst #1716
  • System Menu API support for Windows #1717
  • [Bug] Gif image not working in MAUI #5034
    6.0.300
  • [iOS]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4286
    6.0.300
  • ComboBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5146
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [ios] Cant set TabbedPage BarBackgroundColor in iOS 15 #4814
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • MAUI Blazor Deploy Failed #5123
    6.0.300
  • Could not set window size in Mac app #5518
  • Shell is not working in MAUI Preview 14 for iOS #5516
  • [Android] Cannot scroll vertical CollectionView #4107
  • Unable to build the latest MAUI (preview 14.0) project with VS 2022 for Mac Preview 7 (17.0 Preview, build 8001) #5499
  • The visual studio of last preview version doesn't support MAUI #5508
  • MAUI Sqlite doesn't work on Mac M1 Monterey #5269
  • Unable to install main Maui following Dev instructions #4934
  • XAML editor no longer working for MAUI library in Preview 13 #4740
  • Issue in Localization #2345
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] Localization with Humanizer (on Android) #3992
  • [iOS] MSB4044: The "GetMlaunchArguments" task was not given a value for the required parameter "AppBundlePath". #4469
  • Injecting ViewModel to View (ContentPage) in .Net MAUI MVVM #5507
  • [Windows] CollectionView ScrollTo methods not working #4115
  • [Bug] Preview 9 breaks CollectionView update with ObservableCollection #3002
  • [Android] CollectionView ScrollTo methods not working #4110
  • iOS CollectionView thows exception when adding items to an ObservableCollection #3514
  • Undefined symbols for architecture arm64 when switching from preview13 to preview14 #5411
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • The status page does not tell you what version it's talking about #3699
  • [Bug] Windows app lifecycle overrides called multiple times on app startup #2751
  • grey titlebar on windows when using the content page #5067
  • [Enhancement] Color.FromArgb should take each component as parameters of byte #2279
    .NET 7
  • Difference between Paint and Brush #2453
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Clipping not working #4053
  • [Windows] Incorrect rendering Path and RenderTransform property not working #4047
  • [Android] Wrong position clipping layouts or image #4014
    6.0.300
  • Clip property is not working properly after MAUI preview 9 release #3081
  • [Bug] Android looks like it has a rounding different when apply Corner Radius vs iOS #2261
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Clip is off position #2051
    6.0.200-preview.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that DispatchTimer is re-started if Start() is called again. (on Windows) #5533
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Importing Maui property pages #5529
  • [android] port RootLayout.axml to Java #5528
  • Add Powershell as a pre-req for MacOS #5525
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix ImageConverter #5522
  • [Housekeeping] Ported pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms #5510
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [Android] Fix rendering shadows in element off-screen controls in ScrollView #5515
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Normalize RTL behavior for layouts #5495
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [macCatalyst] Fix DateTime and Time pickers on the mac #5475
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • AutoSuggestBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5482
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Change platform type for ShellItemHandler #5500
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix issue using LineBreakMode and MaxLines at the same time #5093
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Reset pressed state if touch event is cancelled #5488
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix a few extension methods #5521
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Fix clipping issues #5465
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Picker: use default ComboBox styles on WinUI 3 #5501
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Fix TabbedPage colors in iOS 15 #5135
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Only show .NET MAUI templates in VS 17.2+ & maui workload installed #5483
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [android] port maui_toolbar.axml to Java #5493
    area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • Graphics events #5498
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Conform the Essentials API to the rest of MAUI #5407
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [workload] move @(KnownFrameworkReference) to WorkloadManifest.targets #5429
    area/setup 🪄, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix SearchBar TextChanged event not working issue #5462
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Housekeeping] Updated Gallery to verify Slider Maximum value can be updated #5463
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [X] compile gridlength and row|defcollection #5489
    area/layout 🔲
  • BlazorWebView: Allow for WPF and WinForms WebView2 Custom Startup Settings and Fixed Distribution Mode #5086
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
